newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Cemig maintained as hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Cemig maintained as hold.

text.p: -- Robert Fleming Inc said it is maintaining its hold recommendation on Minas Gerais state-owned power firm Cemig.
-- The brokerage cited the company shows little near-term upside potential for the stock based on fundamentals.
-- Cemig is run like a public company and "squandered an excellent opportunity this year to maximize its operating margin," it said.
-- But the situation could change once Cemig takes on a new strategic partner, Fleming said.

-- "We see the presence of a new partner as very favorable interms of managerial discipline, better preparing Cemig for a more competative scenario in which it hopes to be a net exporter of electricity to otherstates," the brokerage said.
-- Fleming said it is maintaining its hold rating until it sees more concrete signs of improvement in fundamentals or a shift in the firm's managerial style relating to cost containment.
-- Cemig's preferred was up 2.17 percent to 33.00 reais while its common voting share was trading 2.89 percent higher at 54.50 reais at 1127 local/1327 gmt on the Sao Paulo Stock Exchange.
